org.hps.readout.hodoscope

Class HodoscopePatternReadoutDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lcsim.util.Driver
      • org.hps.readout.ReadoutDriver
        • org.hps.readout.hodoscope.HodoscopePatternReadoutDriver

  • public class HodoscopePatternReadoutDriver
extends ReadoutDriver
    Class HodoscopePatternReadoutDriver produces hodoscope pattern objects for Ecal-hodo matching in the trigger simulation. Persistency of Hodo FADC hits is persistentTime. On the other hand, hodo FADC hits is earlier to enter the trigger system than Ecal by timeEarlierThanEcal Therefore, for each clock-cycle, FADC hits in [localTime - (persistentTime - timeEarlierThanEcal), localTime + timeEarlierThanEcal + 4] are taken into account to generate hodoscope patterns for all layers.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.lcsim.util.Driver

        Driver.AbortRunException, Driver.NextEventException

    • Field Detail

      • channelMap

        private Map<Long,HodoscopeChannel> channelMap
        Maps hodoscope channel IDs to channels.

      • inputCollectionName

        private String inputCollectionName
        The name of the collection that contains the hodo FADC hits, which raw energy is self-defined. Through the hodo FADC hits, hodoscope pattern is generated.

      • outputCollectionName

        private String outputCollectionName
        The name of the collection into which generated hodoscope patterns for all four layers should be output.

      • localTime

        private double localTime
        The local time for the driver.

      • fADCHitThreshold

        private double fADCHitThreshold
        Hodoscope FADC hit cut

      • hodoHitThreshold

        private double hodoHitThreshold
        Hodoscope tilt/cluster hit cut

      • gainFactor

        private double gainFactor
        Gain scaling factor for hits at two-hole tiles. Gains from database need to be scaled by the factor Gains in the DAQ configuration have been scaled by the factor.

      • persistentTime

        private double persistentTime
        Persistent time for hodoscope FADC hit in unit of ns

      • timeEarlierThanEcal

        private double timeEarlierThanEcal
        Time for hodoscope FADC hits earlier to enter the trigger system than Ecal with unit of ns

      • localTimeDisplacement

        private double localTimeDisplacement
        The length of time by which objects produced by this driver are shifted due to the need to buffer data from later events. This is calculated automatically. Hodo FADC hits enter the trigger system earlier than Ecal hits by timeEarlierThanEcal

      • TopLayer1

        public static final int TopLayer1
        According to setup in database, index for hodoscope layers are expressed as (layer+1)*y
        See Also:

      • getTimeDisplacement

        protected double getTimeDisplacement()
        Description copied from class: ReadoutDriver
        Specifies the amount of simulation time that the driver needs to produce its output. This indicates that the driver's present output was generated based on input a time equal to (getCurrentTime() - getTimeDisplacement()).
        Specified by:
        getTimeDisplacement in class ReadoutDriver
        Returns:
        Returns the time displacement of output data as a double.

      • getTimeNeededForLocalOutput

        protected double getTimeNeededForLocalOutput()
        Description copied from class: ReadoutDriver
        Specifies the amount of simulation time that the driver needs to produce special on-trigger data.
        Specified by:
        getTimeNeededForLocalOutput in class ReadoutDriver
        Returns:
        Returns the time displacement of output data as a double.
